content.taskInstructions:
Instructions


Review Shodan data for available ports and services.

Variation: smap


1. Download the latest release, or download the source and build with go.
go install -v github.com/s0md3v/smap/cmd/smap@latest

OR
git clone https://github.com/s0md3v/Smap.git
cd Smap/cmd/smap
go build

2. Run the tool.

Example:


./smap -oS - scanme.nmap.org

Smap (0.1.0-rc)

+ 45.33.32.156 (scanme.nmap.org, scanme.nmap.org)
- OS: MiniBSD
- Tags: cloud
+ Ports:
- 80 tcp/http cpe:/a:apache:http_server:2.4.7
- 22 tcp/ssh?
- 123 tcp/ntp?
- Vulns: CVE-2018-1312, CVE-2015-3185, CVE-2016-0736, CVE-2014-0231, CVE-2017-7679, CVE-2019-0220, CVE-2014-8109, CVE-2018-1283, CVE-2017-15715, CVE-2016-8612, CVE-2016-2161, CVE-2014-3523, CVE-2014-0118, CVE-2014-0226, CVE-2018-17199, CVE-2014-0117, CVE-2017-15710, CVE-2015-3184, CVE-2017-9798, CVE-2013-6438, CVE-2016-4975, CVE-2014-0098, CVE-2017-9788, CVE-2016-8743

Variation: Manual


1. Log into shodan.io
https://account.shodan.io/

Web Login:
User: ipsten
Pass: tCi6VdPE5p1QyGBTfNkMzIy0qoon89qqZrLwYk

API Key (for any tools that could use it):
TsAUQ1SFV04sjSQIjD2ympPfF0jLe2Sz

2. Attempt to identify useful information for in scope IP addresses. Consider searching by IP, IP range, and company name. Below are some examples.
  • org:"comcast"

  • org:"comcast" city:minneapolis

  • net:206.209.112.0/24

  • port:443

  • product:"SonicWALL firewall http config" port:"443"

  • Apache city:"San Francisco" port:"8080" product:"Apache Tomcat/Coyote JSP engine"

  • ameriprise org:"Amazon.com"


Report Verification


Include copies of relevant data in the task notes and be sure to create findings for identified vulnerable versions. You may also be able to recover subdomains for targeting. Also, watch for the use of AWS and Azure.

More Notes


Note: Ryan K is working on a database and api.
Link to information finding - users exposed in breach data.
We need to add a finding to the "Vulnerability Enumeration: Manual Findings" category:
  • Run shodan dump to get basic service information


Common use cases for data
  • determine if we are being blocked by ips

  • choose systems for sampled testing after discovery scanning / dump

  • identify potential vulnerabilities

masterFinding.remediationInstructions: Corrective actions may not be required, but it is important to be aware that online services that provide cached data about environments are can be leveraged by attackers.
masterFinding.name: General Information - Domains - Online Caches
masterFinding.description: It was possible to discover domains and subdomains by querying online services such as Shodan.com, Censys.com, and trailofbits.com.
